      • requiredState

        public java.util.Set<ShardedParticleStateId> requiredState(BurnTokensAction burnTokensAction)
        Description copied from interface: StatefulActionToParticleGroupsMapper
        Retrieves the necessary application state to be used in creating new particles given a high level action. The returned Observable describes the shardable and the type of state needed to create particles.
        Specified by:
        requiredState in interface StatefulActionToParticleGroupsMapper<BurnTokensAction>
        Parameters:
        burnTokensAction - the action to get the required context about
        Returns:
        required contexts required to create spun particles for the action
